title: Casper 8 Startup Disc (Boot CD)
description:
Casper 8 Startup Disc (Boot CD)
 
 
This Casper 8 Boot CD is created with Casper 8.0.4422, by Myself.
  
Casper 8 Homepage: http://www.fssdev.com/products/casper/
 
 
Using the Casper Startup Disc:
 
If you are unable to boot your computer directly from your Casper backup hard disk, you can use
the Casper Startup Disc to restore your computerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s internal hard disk from the backup disk.
 
For example, if you used an external hard disk for the backup, and your computer will not
boot and run directly from the external hard disk, you can restore your computer by booting
from Casper Startup Disc and using Casper Drive Backup to copy the external hard disk,
to your computerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s internal hard disk.
 
Booting from the Casper Startup Disc may take several minutes.
Once it has completed the boot process, the familiar Casper Drive Backup console will display.
